page.title: 07EMMA'S MORNING IN BYFIELD
page.content: I WOKE UP AT 8.30 A.M. AND MY MUM BROUGHT IN MY BREAKFAST AND MY CLOTHES, THEN OUR CAT TIGGY CAME IN AND CUDDLED UP TO ME SO THAT DELAYED ME A BIT.MUM SHOUTED UP THE STAIRS,"GET DRESSED EMMA",SO I GOT DRESSED IN MY GREY PINAFORE AND PINK BLOUSE.I AM A VERY SLOW DRESSER SO WHEN WE GOT OUT OF THE HOUSE IT WAS ABOUT 9.00 A.M.WHEN I GOT TO SCHOOL WE HAD TO GO DOWN TO ASSEMBLY.MR.GILES WAS TAKING THE ASSEMBLY AND HE READ US A STORY.THEN WE ALL FILED UP TO SCHOOL.WE DID SPELLINGS AND TABLES.ALL OF OUR TABLE GOT 10 OUT OF 10.THEN WE WENT OUT TO PLAY.I PLAYED "HORSES" WITH KATE,THEN ONE OF THE TEACHERS CLAPPED AND WE CAME INSIDE AND WATCHED TELEVISION.THEN WE DID SOME WRITING ON THE DOMESDAY PROJECT.THEN WE WENT DOWN TO LUNCH.WE HAD CHEESE FLAN FOR LUNCH.
